PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DistributionChamberElementTypeFormedDuct
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from BS6100 100 3410: Space formed in the ground for the passage of pipes, cables, ducts.

PropertyDef.Name: ClearWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The width of the formed space in the duct.

PropertyDef.Name: ClearDepth
PropertyDef.Definition: The depth of the formed space in the duct.

PropertyDef.Name: WallMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: The material from which the wall of the duct is constructed. NOTE: It is assumed that duct walls will be constructed of a single material.

PropertyDef.Name: WallThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The thickness of the duct wall construction NOTE: It is assumed that chamber walls will be constructed at a single thickness.

PropertyDef.Name: BaseMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: The material from which the base of the duct is constructed. NOTE: It is assumed that duct base will be constructed of a single material.

PropertyDef.Name: BaseThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The thickness of the duct base construction NOTE: It is assumed that duct base will be constructed at a single thickness.

PropertyDef.Name: AccessCoverMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: The material from which the access cover to the chamber is constructed. NOTE: It is assumed that chamber walls will be constructed of a single material.

PropertyDef.Name: AccessCoverLoadRating
PropertyDef.Definition: The load rating of the access cover (which may be a value or an alphanumerically defined class rating)

PropertyDef.Name: FillMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: The material that is used to fill the duct (where used).
